SpheromancerHeart.NAME: Spheromancer Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: Give you 3SP at the start of each fight. NL +2 of each element.

leacrosscode:PreciseFocus.NAME: Precise Focus
DESCRIPTIONS: +1 Wave NL Enemies with Target takes one more damage from BULLETS.

leacrosscode:MartialCounterAttack.NAME: Martial CounterAttack
DESCRIPTIONS: +1 Cold NL You gain 1 Vigor for each damage reduced by Protection.

leacrosscode:ConductiveRock.NAME: Conductive Rock
DESCRIPTIONS: +5 Shock -2 Wave NL Each combat, apply double jolt stacks on ennemies.

leacrosscode:TurtleShell.NAME: Turtle Shell
DESCRIPTIONS: +1 Cold NL Each combat, gain 2 Protection during the 2 first turn.

leacrosscode:EasyMode.NAME: Easy Mode
DESCRIPTIONS: +1 Heat/Cold/Shock/Wave NL Each combat, ALL ennemies lose 1 Strength.

leacrosscode:BulletStock.NAME: Bullet Stock
DESCRIPTIONS: +2 Wave NL At the start of combat, add 2 Bullet to your hand.

leacrosscode:FieryTitansGauntlet.NAME: Fiery Titans Gauntlet
DESCRIPTIONS: +4 Heat -3 Cold NL On obtain, transform ALL your Hit into Fiery Hit.

leacrosscode:MassCarnage.NAME: Mass Carnage
DESCRIPTIONS: +1 Heat NL Whenever an enemy dies, gain 3 Vigor and draw 2 cards.

leacrosscode:ThunderBoots.NAME: Thunder Boots
DESCRIPTIONS: +4 Shock -3 Wave NL At the start of combat, apply 4 Jolt to ALL ennemies.
